ticket.title: FAC: ContextPackManifest types and allowlist matching

in_scope: Define ManifestEntry with path and content_hash

steps: Add pub mod context to crates/apm2-core/src/lib.rs
Define ManifestEntry with stable_id, path, content_hash, access_level
Write unit tests for allowlist matching

criteria: is_allowed correctly matches paths and content hashes

notes.security:
ContextPackManifest defines the OCAP allowlist for file reads.
All reads outside this allowlist are denied by the context firewall.
notes.implementation_details:
ContextPackManifest fields:
- manifest_id, manifest_hash, profile_id
- entries: Vec<ManifestEntry>

ManifestEntry fields:
- stable_id (optional), path, content_hash
- access_level: Read | ReadWithZoom
